org.elasticsearch.action.support

Class ToXContentToBytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.support.ToXContentToBytes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToXContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractQueryBuilder, EmptyQueryBuilder, IndexWarmersMetaData.SearchSource, PercolateSourceBuilder, QueryInnerHits, SearchSourceBuilder, ShapeBuilder, SuggestBuilder, SuggestBuilder.SuggestionBuilder, TranslogStats

    public abstract class ToXContentToBytes
extends java.lang.Object
implements ToXContent
    Base class for ToXContent implementation that also support conversion to BytesReference for serialization purposes

    • Method Detail

      • buildAsBytes

        public final BytesReference buildAsBytes()
        Returns a BytesReference containing the ToXContent output in binary format. Builds the request based on the default XContentType, either Requests.CONTENT_TYPE or provided as a constructor argument

      • buildAsBytes

        public final BytesReference buildAsBytes(XContentType contentType)
        Returns a BytesReference containing the ToXContent output in binary format. Builds the request as the provided contentType
